quotes.quote: Everything that irritates us about others can lead us to an understanding of ourselves.
quotes.author: Carl Gustav Jung

quotes.quote: Your visions will become clear only when you can look into your own heart. Who looks outside, dreams; who looks inside, awakes.
quotes.author: Carl Gustav Jung

quotes.quote: I am not what happened to me, I am what I choose to become.
quotes.author: Carl Gustav Jung

quotes.quote: You are what you do, not what you say you'll do.
quotes.author: Carl Gustav Jung

quotes.quote: Sometimes even to live is an act of courage.
quotes.author: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quotes.quote: Luck is what happens when preparation meets opportunity.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: We suffer more often in imagination than in reality
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Difficulties strengthen the mind, as labor does the body.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: As is a tale, so is life: not how long it is, but how good it is, is what matters.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Difficulty comes from our lack of confidence.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: We have two ears and one mouth so that we can listen twice as much as we speak.
quotes.author: Epictetus (AD 50-135)

quotes.quote: Better to trip with the feet than with the tongue.
quotes.author: Zeno

quotes.quote: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius, Meditations

quotes.quote: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius, Meditations

quotes.quote: Waste no more time arguing about what a good man should be. Be one.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius, Meditations

quotes.quote: The soul becomes dyed with the colour of its thoughts.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius, Meditations

quotes.quote: Settle on the type of person you want to be and stick to it, whether alone or in company.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius, Meditations

quotes.quote: I cannot escape death, but at least I can escape the fear of it.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius, Meditations
